origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'AlibabaCloudAPI.analyze_RnD_allocation', 'description': 'This function analyzes the allocation of R&D expenses for a specified technology over a given period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which the allocation is to be analyzed, e.g., 5 years, 10 years.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific technology for which the allocation is to be analyzed, e.g., data analysis, cloud computing.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'allocation', 'description': 'The detailed allocation of R&D expenses for the specified period and technology.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
然后，分析这些支出在不同技术上的具体分配。
